eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
ds^2&=&f^{-{\half}}_1\left(2 dx^+dx^- + K(x_i)(dx^+)^2\right) \cr
& \cr
&+& f^{\half}_1{\sum^{8}_{m=1}}(dx^m)^2,\>\>\>
(i = 1,...,4),\cr
& \cr
H & = & \p_1 b_2(x_i)\>dx^+\wedge dx^1\wedge dx^2 + \p_3 b_4(x_i)\>dx^+\wedge
dx^3\wedge dx^4,\cr 
& \cr
e^{2\phi}&=& f_1, ~~~~F_{+-n}=\p_n f^{-1}_1,
\label{d1}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
ds^2&=&(f_1 f_5)^{-{1\over 2}}(2 dx^+dx^-
+ K(x_i) (dx^+)^2) + \Big({f_1 \over f_5}\Big)^{1\over
  2}{\sum_{m=5}^{8}}(dx^m)^2 \cr
& \cr
&+&(f_1 f_5)^{1\over 2}{\sum_{i=1}^{4}}(dx^i)^2, \cr
& \cr
e^{2\phi} &=& {f_1\over f_5} ,\cr
& \cr
H & = & \p_1 b_2(x_i)\>dx^+\wedge dx^1\wedge dx^2 + \p_3 b_4(x_i)\> dx^+\wedge
dx^3\wedge dx^4, \cr
& \cr
F_{+ - i}&=&\partial_{i}{f_1}^{-1},~~~~F_{i j k} = \epsilon_{i j k l}
\partial_{l}f_5,
\label{d1-d5}
\
